amendment.description: At the end of title I, add the following: SEC. 1__. CONSIDERATION OF USE OF NATURAL AND NATURE-BASED FEATURE. In carrying out the design, construction, maintenance, repair, and rehabilitation of development projects, including flood risk reduction, coastal resiliency, and ecosystem restoration projects, the Secretary shall ensure that appropriate consideration is given to the use of natural and nature-based features.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ribble amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ribble amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A028) offered by Mr. Ribble.
